Uses of Package
simplenlg.features

  • Packages that use simplenlg.features 
    Package Description
    simplenlg.aggregation  
    simplenlg.features
    The features package contains enumerated types that are used for specific features.
    simplenlg.features.spanish  
    simplenlg.framework
    The framework package contains the base components required for running the SimpleNLG package.
    simplenlg.lexicon  
    simplenlg.lexicon.spanish  
    simplenlg.syntax
    The syntax package contains the processing module that handles the syntax in the SimpleNLG package.
  • Classes in simplenlg.features used by simplenlg.aggregation 
    Class and Description
    DiscourseFunction
    An enumeration representing the grammatical function that an element might take.
  • Classes in simplenlg.features used by simplenlg.features 
    Class and Description
    ClauseStatus
    This is an enumeration of the two different types of clauses used in the SimplNLG package.
    DiscourseFunction
    An enumeration representing the grammatical function that an element might take.
    Form
    An enumeration representing the different forms a verb and its associated phrase can take.
    Gender
    An enumeration representing the gender of the subject of a noun phrase, or the object or subject of a verb phrase.
    Inflection
    An enumeration representing the different types of morphology patterns used by the basic morphology processor included with SimpleNLG.
    InterrogativeType
    An enumeration representing the different types of interrogatives or questions that SimpleNLG can realise.
    NumberAgreement
    An enumeration representing the different types of number agreement.
    Person
    This is an enumeration used to represent the point of view of the narrative.
    Tense
    An enumeration representing the different types of temporal sense that can be applied to a verb.
  • Classes in simplenlg.features used by simplenlg.features.spanish 
    Class and Description
    LexicalFeature
    This class defines a list of constant values used by SimpleNLG lexicons.
  • Classes in simplenlg.features used by simplenlg.framework 
    Class and Description
    Inflection
    An enumeration representing the different types of morphology patterns used by the basic morphology processor included with SimpleNLG.
    Tense
    An enumeration representing the different types of temporal sense that can be applied to a verb.
  • Classes in simplenlg.features used by simplenlg.lexicon 
    Class and Description
    InterrogativeType
    An enumeration representing the different types of interrogatives or questions that SimpleNLG can realise.
  • Classes in simplenlg.features used by simplenlg.lexicon.spanish 
    Class and Description
    InterrogativeType
    An enumeration representing the different types of interrogatives or questions that SimpleNLG can realise.
  • Classes in simplenlg.features used by simplenlg.syntax 
    Class and Description
    DiscourseFunction
    An enumeration representing the grammatical function that an element might take.
    NumberAgreement
    An enumeration representing the different types of number agreement.
    Tense
    An enumeration representing the different types of temporal sense that can be applied to a verb.
